price: We have brought them a Book which We have explained in detail on the basis of knowledge, as guidance and mercy for people who believe.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰهُم بِكِتَٰبٖ فَصَّلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ هُدٗى وَرَحۡمَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
